suicideNote: r"Depression!! 多謝各位朋友，多謝麥列菲菲教授。 一年來很辛苦，不能再忍受，多謝唐先生，多謝家人，多謝肥姐。 我一生冇做壞事，為何這樣？？？ - Leslie"
translation: r"Depression! Many thanks to all my friends. Many thanks to Professor Felice Lieh-Mak. This year has been so tough. I can't stand it anymore. Many thanks to Mr. Tong. Many thanks to my family. Many thanks to Sister Fei. In my life I have done nothing bad. Why does it have to be like this?"
